statements: SELECT * FROM RecyclingProgram;
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM RecyclingProgram WHERE truck_id = 3;
SELECT route_id, route_name, collection_day FROM RecyclingProgram WHERE route_id > 100;
SELECT * FROM RecyclingProgram ORDER BY collection_day DESC;
SELECT route_id, route_name, truck_id FROM RecyclingProgram WHERE collection_day = 'Monday' ORDER BY route_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM RecyclingProgram WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, collection_day FROM RecyclingProgram WHERE truck_id = 3;
SELECT route_name, collection_day FROM RecyclingProgram ORDER BY collection_day ASC;
SELECT * FROM RecyclingProgram WHERE collection_day = 'Monday' AND truck_id IN (1, 2);
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM RecyclingProgram WHERE collection_day IN ('Tuesday', 'Thursday');
SELECT * FROM collection_schedule;
SELECT schedule_id, collection_date, collection_frequency FROM collection_schedule;
SELECT driver_id, collection_date FROM collection_schedule WHERE collection_frequency = 'Weekly';
SELECT * FROM truck_routes ORDER BY route_name;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM truck_routes WHERE driver_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM collection_schedule WHERE collection_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT collection_date, collection_frequency FROM collection_schedule WHERE driver_id = 5 ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM truck_routes WHERE driver_id = 3 AND route_id > 100 ORDER BY route_id ASC;
SELECT route_name, end_location FROM truck_routes WHERE driver_id = 2 AND start_location LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY end_location;
SELECT schedule_id, collection_date, collection_frequency, driver_id FROM collection_schedule WHERE driver_id IN (1, 4, 6) ORDER BY collection_frequency ASC, collection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM collection_schedule;
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM routes;
SELECT schedule_id, day_of_week FROM collection_schedule WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM truck_details WHERE driver_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT schedule_id, day_of_week, route_id FROM collection_schedule ORDER BY day_of_week DESC;
SELECT * FROM collection_schedule WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT schedule_id, day_of_week FROM collection_schedule WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday';
SELECT truck_id, truck_number, driver_name FROM truck_details WHERE driver_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM routes ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT route_id, route_name, truck_assigned FROM routes INNER JOIN collection_schedule ON routes.route_id = collection_schedule.route_id;
SELECT * FROM CollectionSchedule;
SELECT route_id, route_name, truck_id FROM Routes WHERE truck_id = 123;
SELECT schedule_id, collection_day, pickup_time FROM CollectionSchedule WHERE schedule_id = 5;
SELECT truck_name, driver_name, capacity FROM Trucks WHERE capacity > 5000;
SELECT collection_id, collection_date, collected_weight FROM CollectionHistory ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CollectionSchedule ORDER BY collection_day DESC, pickup_time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT route_name, truck_name, driver_name FROM Routes JOIN Trucks ON Routes.truck_id = Trucks.truck_id WHERE Routes.route_id = 1;
SELECT collection_date, collected_weight FROM CollectionHistory WHERE truck_id = 2 AND collection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT schedule_id, collection_day, route_id FROM CollectionSchedule WHERE route_id IN (SELECT route_id FROM Routes WHERE truck_id = 3);
SELECT AVG(collected_weight) AS average_weight FROM CollectionHistory GROUP BY route_id HAVING AVG(collected_weight) > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Collection_Schedule;
SELECT schedule_id, day_of_week, pickup_zone FROM Collection_Schedule WHERE schedule_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Pickup_Zones ORDER BY zone_name DESC;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM Truck_Routes WHERE truck_id = 3;
SELECT collection_date, collected_weight FROM Collection_Logs WHERE collected_weight > 100 ORDER BY collection_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Collection_Schedule ORDER BY schedule_id DESC;
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_location, end_location FROM Truck_Routes WHERE truck_id = 123;
SELECT zone_name, zone_location FROM Pickup_Zones WHERE zone_location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT schedule_id, day_of_week, collection_time, pickup_zone FROM Collection_Schedule WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday' AND pickup_zone = 'Zone A';
SELECT schedule_date, driver_name, route_name FROM Truck_Schedule JOIN Truck_Routes ON Truck_Schedule.route_id = Truck_Routes.route_id;
